articles.title: Reliance Retail takes on Nykaa, launches omni-channel beauty product platform Tira - Economic Times
articles.description: The Tira store at Jio World Drive in Mumbai is spread across 4,300 square feet.  Our vision for Tira is to be the leading beauty destination for accessible yet aspirational beauty, said Isha Ambani, Executive Director, Reliance Retail Ventures Limited.

articles.title: India's power output grows at fastest pace in 33 years, fuelled by coal - Reuters
articles.description: India's power generation grew at the fastest pace in over three decades in the just-ended fiscal year, a Reuters analysis of government data showed, fuelling a sharp surge in emissions as output from both coal-fired and renewable plants hit records.
